name: Precision Microdrives
overview:
Precision Microdrives is a leading supplier of DC vibration motors, haptic feedback mechanisms and miniature (sub 20mm diameter) DC geared motors.

The vibration motor products are split into 4 ranges based on size and usage; haptic feedback for handheld battery powered applications, larger motors for massagers and adult toys as well as industrial haptic feedback motors. The largest range of vibration motors is used for applications requiring mechanical aid in mixing, sorting.

Precision Microdrives has a leading technical competence in the development and manufacture of mechanisms particularly in the field of haptic feedback and vibro-tactile feedback. Their website offers a lot of freely available advice on implementing vibration feedback.

Miniature DC gear motors are a speciality particularly for low voltage DC motors with a sub 20mm diameter frame size.

All products are available off-the-shelf. Precision Microdrives can customise products, and manufacture a wide range DC vibration motors and small gear motors to specification.
